definition.name: NXcs_io_obj

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

definition.doc: Computer science description of a storage object in an input/output system.

field.name: technology
field.doc: Qualifier for the type of storage medium used.

field.name: max_physical_capacity
field.doc: Total amount of data which the medium can hold.

field.name: name
field.doc: Given name to the I/O unit.
